DataElement.preferredName: Person North American Association of Central Cancer Registries Race Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text description related to the racial groups of a person official written in North American Association of Central Cancer Registries(NAACCR).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person North American Association of Central Cancer Registries Race
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the racial groups of a person official written in North American Association of Central Cancer Registries(NAACCR).

Property.preferredName: North American Association of Central Cancer Registries Race
Property.preferredDefinition: A professional organization that develops and promotes uniform data standards for cancer registration; provides education and training; certifies population-based registries; aggregates and publishes data from central cancer registries; and promotes the use of cancer surveillance data and systems for cancer control and epidemiologic research, public health programs, and patient care to reduce the burden of cancer in North America.:Major living subspecies of man differentiated by genetic and physical characteristics. There are four racial groups: Australoid, Caucasoid, Mongoloid, and Negroid.

Concepts.longName: North American Association of Central Cancer Registries
Concepts.definition: A professional organization that develops and promotes uniform data standards for cancer registration; provides education and training; certifies population-based registries; aggregates and publishes data from central cancer registries; and promotes the use of cancer surveillance data and systems for cancer control and epidemiologic research, public health programs, and patient care to reduce the burden of cancer in North America.
A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text description of the patient's/participant's racial orgination.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed max length from 100 for harmonization.
